site_name: Code Unminifier

site_type: WebApplication
category: Code Beautifier / Developer Tools
description: 
  Code Unminifier is a free online tool that unminifies and beautifies
  JavaScript, HTML, CSS, JSON, and XML directly in the browser. 
  It performs all formatting client-side using js-beautify, vkbeautify, 
  and native JSON parsing for complete privacy. No code is uploaded 
  to any server.

features:
  - Unminify JavaScript (JS)
  - Beautify HTML
  - Format CSS
  - Parse & prettify JSON
  - Beautify XML
  - Auto language detection using highlight.js
  - Split-view & single-view editor modes
  - File upload and download support
  - Byte-size indicators for input/output
  - Adjustable tab size
  - Fast, private, browser-based processing

technology_stack:
  - js-beautify
  - vkbeautify
  - highlight.js
  - Vanilla JavaScript
  - Client-side only (no backend processing)

target_users:
  - Web developers
  - Students learning coding
  - Debuggers & reviewers
  - Reverse engineering tasks
  - Anyone working with minified files

privacy:
  - Fully client-side formatting
  - No uploads, no storage, no tracking of code input
  - Safe for sensitive or private code snippets

use_cases:
  - Make minified JS readable again
  - Beautify HTML for structure inspection
  - Clean up messy CSS for editing
  - Format JSON for debugging APIs
  - Beautify XML used in configs or feeds
  - Debug third-party scripts
  - Learn from compressed or obfuscated code
